title: 15e18 - Relatives.
text:
There are no exceptions from
coverage, on the basis of family relationship, for relatives who are performing
the work of laborers or mechanics. They must be paid the prevailing wage rate
for the classification of work performed and included in the payroll records.
html: There are no exceptions from coverage, on the basis of family relationship, for relatives who are performing the work of laborers or mechanics. They must be paid the prevailing wage rate for the classification of work performed and included in the payroll records.
